modName: Skimpy Royal Vampire Armor Dark Retexture UNP CBBE
summary: A new high quality texture for the Skimpy Royal Vampire Armor mod. ( Texture works for male too)
descriptionHtml:
You may re-use this mesh or textures however you want.

This is an armor replacement mod.

Here is the original mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22683//? (not required)

The new colors are much more intense: dark black and rich red. 

The female version has a flower pattern in white on the cape. The male is more like cracks.

If you wanted to, this texture could be applied without the new mesh too for a less skimpy version.

I\'ve tested with UNP and CBBE slim and both work, but the CBBE heavy body has a few minor clipping issues. There are also some clipping issues with custom run animations.

And here\'s the adult part, this mesh has the built in underwear removed, so if you don\'t want upskirts while sneaking or on a low camera you\'ll need a panty mod.

How to acquire the item: Either follow the Dawnguard quest line, or add it with the console (id: xx00B5DB)

Updates: 

- Added version 1.1 to fix a bug where the texture sometimes wouldn\'t load. To update just overwrite and replace files, none need to be removed.

- Added new texture for the hood. If you want to obtain the hood for your character, you need \"Vampire Royal Hood - Sun Protecting by AncientVampire and Khrada\" (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28438//?)
author: rasungod
